title: City square mall
review: City square mall is one of good mall of Ajmer . Nice place.good for shopping. Must try this city mall.

title: Only Big bazaar in ajmer
review: Situated in the outskirts of the city. Has almost no brands. Only big bazaar available. No proper food court. Overall a disappointment

title: Shopping
review: City square mall is good place for shopping for every product and everything.my experience of shopping

title: Cool mall
review: When i visited this city i thought this is going to be a village. but this Mall changed my point of view. Nice Mall good shopping experience

title: It's a Okayish mall in the middle of nowhere
review: Located away from the city it's a okay mall. Not many brands but you have big bazaar, pantaloons and Maxx store

title: Average Mall
review: 1. At least its the best in Malls that Ajmer has to offer.

title: Great...
review: One of my friend told me that it is one of the best mall in Ajmer City so we visited here for some shopping. Food courts are descent. We also saw a movie. We Spent great time here.

title: Modern Ajmer
review: This mall shows you a modern ajmer, its situated far away from old city. but a really nice place to shop , Dine and enjoyment.

title: Shopping Mall
review: There are only few outlets for shopping and good for Movies but if you looking for number of multiple international brands outlets then this place may  disappoint you..it’s like a big shopping complex but doesn’t give Feel like Big Mall...

title: Ok Ok Types of Mall
review: It can be called the bigest mall in Ajmer and if you take out Inox Cinemas away from it.. there is pretty much nothing in it yet!! a very ordinary Food Plaza where half of the things on the menu are not available and more than half the stores closed. Doesnt give a pretty picture but maybe in some near future, there is some movement with news coming in that McDonalds shall open there shortly. There is some cricket nets game outside and also a kids playing area outside the mall. Rest its ok. The 3 stars are basically for the Cinema which is of a good standard.

title: Reasonable rates for most of the items
review: Daily utility items and fashion items are readily available at the disposal which are most of the times in discount.

title: Silent Mall
review: Quite silent place all shops are not fully open,looks very empty,food court on top is good place, and another place after food called is VAPOUR a newly opened sheesha BAR with lovely views of the valleys a good hangout place.

title: Visit to city square mall
review: my first visit to city square mall was amazing ,the mall had a great ambience and decor

title: Nice place to visit
review: Good place to visit ...Nice food at food court and easy on pocket . Kids enjoyed a lot at paint ball . We watched movie at Inox we liked it .

title: Amazing Place
review: The place is great fun and overall experience was excellent.

title: Awesome place to visit!!!
review: City square mall is in the best location of Ajmer. With a view of the hills and restaurants overlooking the city. The food is amazing at the food court and reasonably priced. We had the samosa chaat and chicken kathi roll. Both are a must-try.

title: Best Mall In Ajmer
review: it is an amazing mall in ajmer which is meant to be called a mall. A must visit for all tourist to shop enjoy and eat. Having plenty of activities to do plus shop and eat is a complete package.

title: Csm
review: City square mall is the only place that is called mall all other mall are like complex . Good theatre . Yummy food of food court . And the best part of this mall is  vapor cafe and lounge where u chilling out with your friends families . Where u get best sisha and rooftop view .

title: Dorement mall
review: Foot fall outside the mall is better than the inside, all the branded shop owner are not able to get their break even.

title: Location ok, mall is empty
review: Still building up, shops not fully open. Food court is decent and surprisingly non veg items were good. Parking is very small. Families can come for a decent time here. Not much young people meant for kids only.
